pr_title: Adds a log warning if no sources available

timeline.message:
Adds a log warning if no sources/javadoc/pom is available

Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert <j.albert@data-in-motion.biz>

timeline.bodyText: I think the 2nd arg should just be options.context.getBase(). I don't see why we would want to use a URI here.
timeline.author: bjhargrave

timeline.bodyText: I think the 2nd arg should just be options.context.getBase(). I don't see why we would want to use a URI here. We also should not toString() it in case logging does not happen. Leave the toString() call to the logging code.
